author: Staff Reporter
text:
Three persons were killed and one sustained injuries in a head-on collision involving a government bus and a car on the Pollachi to Valparai Road in the wee hours of Sunday.

The car, carrying four auto rickshaw drivers, was heading to Pollachi from Valparai. While they were nearing Kailash Saw Mill at Rangasamudram on Valparai Road, the government bus coming from Pollachi rammed the four-wheeler, killing three persons on the spot and leaving one injured.

The victims were identified as G. Manikandan (57) of Venkatesa Colony in Pollachi and D. Manikandan (27) and N. Senthil Kumar (40) of T. Kottampatty near Pollachi.

Nandha Kumar (46) from T. Kottampatty suffered a head injury and was said to be out of danger,

Government bus driver Kalimuthu (30) was booked under sections 279 (rash driving or riding on a public way), 337 (causing hurt by act endangering the life or personal safety of others) and 304 (A) (causing death by negligence) of the Indian Penal Code.
title: Three killed in car-bus collision
